api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/product/441125835_pink"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/product/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gak-ajio-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
